headline: Invesco Unlocks $180 Million Windfall After QQQ Vote Passes
summary: Shareholders of the $402 billion Invesco QQQ Trust Series 1 approved changing the fund’s structure from a unit investment trust, which is a little-used structure dating back to the birth of the first exchange-traded funds in the 1990s, an Invesco spokesperson said Friday.  Subject to board approval, Invesco will now lower QQQ’s expense ratio by two basis points to 0.18% given that the item, along with two others, were approved.

raw.headline: Invesco Unlocks $180 Million Windfall After QQQ Vote Passes
raw.summary: Shareholders of the $402 billion Invesco QQQ Trust Series 1 approved changing the fund’s structure from a unit investment trust, which is a little-used structure dating back to the birth of the first exchange-traded funds in the 1990s, an Invesco spokesperson said Friday.  Subject to board approval, Invesco will now lower QQQ’s expense ratio by two basis points to 0.18% given that the item, along with two others, were approved.

headline: Invesco QQQ Shareholders Vote to Approve Modernization
summary: Invesco Ltd. (NYSE: IVZ), a leading global asset management firm announced today that shareholders in Invesco QQQ Trust, Series 1, voted to approve proposals to modernize Invesco QQQ, restructuring it from a unit investment trust ETF to an open-end fund ETF, and changing its governance structure to a board of trustees. Invesco expects QQQ to begin trading as an open-end fund on Monday, December 22.

headline: Best Income Stocks to Buy for Dec. 19
